Design-01.Description: Design Style 03 is a Solid Twin stripe design. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'TEXT' in image) can be added with a border cut between it at the main stripe, and can be the same color or an alternate color from the main stripe.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02 is a Solid stripe with outer pinstripes. The outer pinstripe accents (red in image) can be the same, or alternate color to the main stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'TEXT' in image) can be added with a border cut between it at the main stripe, and can be the same color or an alternate color from the main stripe.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03 is a Tire Track Stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'TEXT' in image) can be added with a border cut between it at the main stripe, and can be the same color or an alternate color from the main stripe.
